column5: Roger, I too am deeply sorry for your loss.  Sitting here on a business trip, I remember all the kind words of encouragement you have offered me in the past. You are a good man, and now you have an angel looking over you.  Your next 'coon trip will be the one - with some extra help from above.  Again, I'm truly sorry Roger.  Steve
My condolences to you and your family Roger

Roger, I'm sorry to hear about the loss of your partner in life. I too am battling the Devil's Disease and it breaks my heart to hear of the passing of another great person. Take care of yourself and your  family and know you have an angel watching over you.
Heart felt condolences to you and all your family Roger.  If you ever need to drop in for a for some one on one my door is always open.
My condolencs to you and your family.   nick
My condolences Roger.
Condolences to you and your family Roger....
Sorry for your loss.
John, Thanks for letting us know. Stopped by this evening and spent a few minutes with Roger..
Sorry for your loss!
Very sorry to hear the bad news Roger. All my best wishes to you and your family.
My deepest condolenses Roger.  Jim
Just wanted to say thanks to everyone hear for all your thoughts and prayers.  It really meant a lot to me and our family. It really is the best board around.

It is with sadness that I post this announcement. Although I have not talked to Roger (BPS Bassman) personally, I feel that he would be OK with me letting his OFC friends know of Chris's passing.   CRAIG, Chris (Christy Ann Rouse) November 04, 2012 Classified Type: Obituaries & Death Notices Location: Hamilton  CRAIG, Chris (Christy Ann Rouse) A new angel has just entered heaven to be with her parents Mae and Ivan. Peacefully at home on November 4, 2012, in her 62nd year. Beloved wife of Roger who shared over 42 loving years beyond human words. Loving Mother of two wonderful sons, Terry (Mandy) of Beamsville and Paul (Andrea) of Brooklin, ON. Survived by her special brother Cal (Marcelle) of Peterborough. Nana to four very special grandchildren, Miranda, Maddy, Evan and Rachel who meant the world to her. Very special friend to Carol Dimitroff. Private cremation has already taken place. Visitation with the family will take place on Friday, November 9 from 3:00 to 5:00 and 7:00 to 9:00 p.m. at DONALD V. BROWN FUNERAL HOME , 36 Lake Avenue Drive, Stoney Creek. A Celebration of Life will take place at a later date. Special thanks to Chris' Angel, Dr. Cari Reed and her staff and all of the Niagara West Palliative Care Team who are so very special. In lieu of flowers, Chris requested that you pass forward an act of kindness and think of her every time you see a Monarch Butterfly. xoxo24
my condolences
I had been pm'g back and forth with Roger for the last year+, and am so sorry to hear that Chris has lost her brave fight.  All the best to Roger and his family at this tough time.

Really sorry to hear that John and thanks for letting us know of her passing  Chris was a very nice lady and will be missed by many.  Ironically, a couple of us were just talking about Chris & Roger this past weekend.

So So sorry to hear this , All the best to Roger and his family at this tough time. THe good allways go so early ... My prayers and all my familys prayers go out to you ... SAD SAD DAY , Roger you got to keep on getting on, many family left counting on ya , we , all the OFC"ers feel for ya .. sad sad time  ...
Wow, I'm so very sorry Roger.  My condolances to you and your family at this sad time.  Will be thinking of you, please stay strong!
My deepest sympathies to you and your family Roger.
So sorry for your loss. I will say a word to the higher power in her name.   God Bless        Paul
Dang very sorry to hear of the loss
Sorry for your loss Roger, condolences to you and your family.

Thanks everyone.  We had a great run.  I asked her to go steady 2 days after I turned 15 (she wasn't quite 14).  The minister that married us said we weren't compatible lol. If people could have 1/10 the happiness we had, they would be doing okay. Never complained when I went fishing and was my biggest supporter when I went to work part time at BPS. I haven't been on here in awhile, but lurk every so often.  Still the best people here bar none. Maybe I'll have time to get back here now.  Never had time once I retired 8O).
very sorry to hear Roger.  At least she will be with you always in your heart, mind and maybe even with you in the boat every time out.
Roger:   Please accept our deepest condolences in your loss
Thanks for posting the pictures Roger. What a beautiful Lady. Sincere condolences from my family to yours.
My condolences to you and your family Rodger.

We all are sorry for your loss Roger. We all wish we had a magic word that would heal but we don't,instead we can say a prayer and hold the memories that she has left behind and keep her spirit alive for the years to come.   Art
Man that's rough... My condolences bud.
Great shots Roger!  Sorry to hear my friend.
So sorry to hear Roger, my deepest condolences.
My condolences.
I'm so sorry to hear of this Roger.  Sending thoughts your way.  Great pictures...thank you so much for sharing them.
Sorry to hear about this Roger. My sincere condolences to you and your family.  God Bless
Very sorry to hear the sad news roger !! Have not heard from you in a long time !! My condolences to you sir and your family
Our condolences to Roger and the other family members...
Roger,you are without a doubt, one of the nicest people I have ever met on this crazy board, my heart and my families go out to you at this time... HH
